configProperty.name: net.sf.jasperreports.xls.format
configProperty.description: Built-in parameter/property holding the value of the Excel format to be used when parsing the Excel data source.

configProperty.name: net.sf.jasperreports.xlsx.data.source.factory
configProperty.description: Property that specifies the name of class implementing the XlsxDataSourceFactory interface, which would be used to instantiate data source objects for reading Excel files of the XLSX format.
